scenarios.name: english_std
scenarios.raw_text: Hello! Thank you for testing Tatterbox TTS. I'm here to assist you with any questions or tasks you might have. How can I help you today?

chunks.text: Hello!
Thank you for testing Tatterbox TTS.
I'm here to assist you with any questions or tasks you might have.
How can I help you today?

scenarios.name: polish_explicit
scenarios.raw_text: Cześć, Jarbis! 😊 Dzięki za przywitanie – miło mi, że możesz mi pomóc! Co dziś potrzebujesz? Czy to pytanie, pomoc w czymś, czy może chcesz po prostu pogadać? 😊

chunks.text: Cześć, Jarbis!
😊 Dzięki za przywitanie – miło mi, że możesz mi pomóc!
Co dziś potrzebujesz?
Czy to pytanie, pomoc w czymś, czy może chcesz po prostu pogadać?

scenarios.name: short2long
scenarios.raw_text: Buddy, a scruffy golden retriever with one floppy ear, loved chasing squirrels in the park every afternoon. One day, he spotted a tiny, trembling kitten stuck in a tree and barked loudly to get help. A kind neighbor heard him and climbed up to rescue the kitten, who was too scared to move. Buddy stayed by their side, wagging his tail gently, as if saying, "It’s okay, I’m here." From that day on, the kitten and Buddy became inseparable friends, sharing sunbeams and snacks under the old oak tree.

chunks.text: Buddy, a scruffy golden retriever with one floppy ear, loved chasing squirrels in the park every afternoon.
One day, he spotted a tiny, trembling kitten stuck in a tree and barked loudly to get help.
A kind neighbor heard him and climbed up to rescue the kitten, who was too scared to move.
Buddy stayed by their side, wagging his tail gently, as if saying, "It’s okay, I’m here."
From that day on, the kitten and Buddy became inseparable friends, sharing sunbeams and snacks under the old oak tree.
Pride and Prejudice

scenarios.raw_text: Cześć Jarbis! Miło mi Cię poznać. W czym mogę Ci dzisiaj pomóc?

scenarios.name: short2long
scenarios.raw_text: Milo, a scruffy terrier with a nose that could sniff out trouble, lived on the edge of a sleepy coastal town. One stormy night, he heard a faint whimper coming from the abandoned lighthouse, and his curiosity pulled him toward the crumbling beams. Inside, he found a tiny, shivering kitten that had slipped from a passing boat. Milo wrapped his warm fur around the kitten, and together they made a pact to protect each other. By dawn, the lighthouse was no longer a lonely ruin but a beacon of friendship, and Milo’s heroic tail wagged louder than any siren.

chunks.text: Milo, a scruffy terrier with a nose that could sniff out trouble, lived on the edge of a sleepy coastal town.
One stormy night, he heard a faint whimper coming from the abandoned lighthouse, and his curiosity pulled him toward the crumbling beams.
Inside, he found a tiny, shivering kitten that had slipped from a passing boat.
Milo wrapped his warm fur around the kitten, and together they made a pact to protect each other.
By dawn, the lighthouse was no longer a lonely ruin but a beacon of friendship, and Milo’s heroic tail wagged louder than any siren.
Pride and Prejudice
